General.Name: Maoye Commercial Co Ltd
General.Description: Maoye Commercial Co., Ltd. operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company also operates hotels and provides property management services. It operates department stores under the Maoye Tiandi, Maoye Department Store, Renhe Spring, People's Department Store, and Victory names. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China. Maoye Commercial Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Maoye Commercial Building Co., Ltd.
